scripts.start:dist: concurrently --raw '"npm run start:dist --workspace packages/graphql"' '"npm run start:dist --workspace packages/website"' '"npm run start:dist --workspace packages/admin"'
scripts.i18n: concurrently --raw 'npm run i18n --workspace packages/admin' 'npm run i18n --workspace packages/website' 'npm run i18n --workspace packages/crm'
scripts.download-schema: concurrently --raw 'npm run download-schema --workspace packages/admin' 'npm run download-schema --workspace packages/website' 'npm run download-schema --workspace packages/crm'
scripts.build:dist: concurrently --raw 'npm run build:dist --workspace packages/graphql' 'npm run build:dist --workspace packages/website' 'npm run build:dist --workspace packages/admin'
scripts.relay: npm run relay --workspace packages/website && npm run relay --workspace packages/admin && npm run relay --workspace packages/crm
